name: Mind your Mind
description:
MoonX Studio is a team of 3 members created around late 2021. We are 3 passionate game developers who wish to create the best and most fun experiences for people that enjoy being immersed and exploring interesting worlds!

Game Artist: Miguel Neto -
https://www.linkedin.com/in/miguel-neto-428828194/

Game Designer & Project manager: Angela Mateus - https://www.linkedin.com/in/angela-mateus-375752194/

Game Developer: Carolina Pereira - 
https://www.linkedin.com/in/carolinascpereira/

Music Composer: HyS-  
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2AfH2Oro90O5BZwyy90Ohg

Sound Designer: João Silva - 
https://allmylinks.com/joaorsilva

SOCIAL MEDIAS:

In case you want more in-depth information about Mind your Mind or our studio feel free to follow our socials:
